verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Then the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יֵה֣וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu came to Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חֲנָ֔נִי <S%H2607><s%> cha-Na-ni, of Hanani עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against בַּעְשָׁ֖א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha against Baasha לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, as אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher I הֲרִימֹתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7311><s%> ha-ri-mo-Ti-cha Forasmuch as I exalted מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הֶ֣עָפָ֔ר <S%H6083><s%> he-'a-Far, thee out of the dust וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-ten-Cha and made נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> na-Gid, thee prince עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ׀ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech have walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech in the way יָרָבְעָ֗ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am, of Jeroboam וַֽתַּחֲטִא֙ <S%H2398><s%> vat-ta-cha-Ti to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi and hast made my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel לְהַכְעִיסֵ֖נִי <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'i-Se-ni to provoke me to anger בְּחַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> be-chat-to-Tam. with their sins

הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מַבְעִ֛יר <S%H1197><s%> mav-'Ir Behold I will take away אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei the posterity בַעְשָׁ֖א <S%H1201><s%> va'-Sha of Baasha וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rei and the posterity בֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> vei-To; of his house וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣יתְךָ֔ <S%H1004><s%> bei-te-cha, thy house כְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> ke-Veit like the house יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְבָֽט׃ <S%H5028><s%> ne-Vat. of Nebat

הַמֵּ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> ham-Met Him that dieth לְבַעְשָׁא֙ <S%H1201><s%> le-va'-Sha of Baasha בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir, in the city יֹֽאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu eat הַכְּלָבִ֑ים <S%H3611><s%> hak-ke-la-Vim; shall the dogs וְהַמֵּ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> ve-ham-Met and him that dieth לוֹ֙ lo בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, of his in the fields יֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu eat ע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of shall the fowls הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. of the air

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> ve-Ye-ter Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the acts בַעְשָׁ֛א <S%H1201><s%> va'-Sha of Baasha וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah and what he did וּגְבֽוּרָת֑וֹ <S%H1369><s%> u-ge-vu-ra-To; and his might הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim, [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> le-mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav slept בַּעְשָׁא֙ <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha So Baasha עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav, with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּתִרְצָ֑ה <S%H8656><s%> be-tir-Tzah; in Tirzah וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-Loch reigned אֵלָ֥ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah and Elah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place

וְגַ֡ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam Moreover בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- And also by the hand יֵה֨וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חֲנָ֜נִי <S%H2607><s%> cha-Na-ni of Hanani הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, of the prophet דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against בַּעְשָׁ֨א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha against Baasha וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- against בֵּית֜וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To and against his house וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הָרָעָ֣ה׀ <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah even for all the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֣ה׀ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah that he did בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסוֹ֙ <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'i-So in provoking him to anger בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Seh with the work יָדָ֔יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav, of his hands לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot being כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> ke-Veit in being like the house יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am; of Jeroboam וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al because אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah and because he killed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To. פ Peh

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <S%H8337><s%> va-Shesh and sixth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, two years לְאָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> le-'a-Sa of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> Ma-lach to reign אֵלָ֨ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah began Elah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son בַּעְשָׁ֧א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha of Baasha עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El over Israel בְּתִרְצָ֖ה <S%H8656><s%> be-tir-Tzah in Tirzah שְׁנָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H8141><s%> she-na-Ta-yim. year

וַיִּקְשֹׁ֤ר <S%H7194><s%> vai-yik-Shor conspired עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav against עַבְדּ֣וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do And his servant זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> zim-Ri, Zimri שַׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> sar captain מַחֲצִ֣ית <S%H4276><s%> ma-cha-Tzit of half הָרָ֑כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ha-Ra-chev; [his] chariots וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu now he בְתִרְצָה֙ <S%H8656><s%> ve-tir-Tzah against him as he was in Tirzah שֹׁתֶ֣ה <S%H8354><s%> sho-Teh drinking שִׁכּ֔וֹר <S%H7910><s%> shik-Kor, himself drunk בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house אַרְצָ֔א <S%H777><s%> 'ar-Tza, of Arza אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit steward of [his] house בְּתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> be-tir-Tzah. in Tirzah

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo went in זִמְרִי֙ <S%H2174><s%> zim-Ri And Zimri וַיַּכֵּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ke-hu and smote וַיְמִיתֵ֔הוּ <S%H4191><s%> vay-mi-Te-hu, him and killed בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim him in the twenty וָשֶׁ֔בַע <S%H7651><s%> va-She-va', and seventh לְאָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> le-'a-Sa of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-Loch and reigned תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בְמָלְכ֜וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho And it came to pass when he began to reign כְּשִׁבְתּ֣וֹ <S%H3427><s%> ke-shiv-To as soon as he sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כִּסְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O, on his throne הִכָּה֙ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah [that] he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit all the house בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha, of Baasha לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not הִשְׁאִ֥יר <S%H7604><s%> hish-'Ir he left ל֖וֹ lo מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <S%H8366><s%> mash-Tin him not one that pisseth בְּקִ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> be-Kir; against a wall וְגֹאֲלָ֖יו <S%H1350><s%> ve-go-'a-Lav neither of his kinsfolks וְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> ve-re-'E-hu. nor of his friends

וַיַּשְׁמֵ֣ד <S%H8045><s%> vai-yash-Med destroy זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> zim-Ri, Thus did Zimri אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit all the house בַּעְשָׁ֑א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha; of Baasha כִּדְבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha, against Baasha בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by יֵה֥וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu Jehu הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi. the prophet

אֶ֚ל <S%H413><s%> 'el about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חַטֹּ֣אות <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tot For all the sins בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha, of Baasha וְחַטֹּ֖אות <S%H2403><s%> ve-chat-Tot and the sins אֵלָ֣ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah of Elah בְנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No; his son אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָטְא֗וּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-te-'U, by which they sinned וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and which הֶחֱטִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H2398><s%> he-che-Ti-'u to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, and by which they made Israel לְהַכְעִ֗יס <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'Is, to anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in provoking the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּהַבְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1892><s%> be-hav-lei-Hem. with their vanities

וְיֶ֛תֶר <S%H3499><s%> ve-Ye-ter Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the acts אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah of Elah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; and all that he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim, [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> le-mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

בִּשְׁנַת֩ <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וָשֶׁ֜בַע <S%H7651><s%> va-She-va' and seventh שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year לְאָסָא֙ <S%H609><s%> le-'a-Sa of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach reign זִמְרִ֛י <S%H2174><s%> zim-Ri did Zimri שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days בְּתִרְצָ֑ה <S%H8656><s%> be-tir-Tzah; in Tirzah וְהָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am And the people חֹנִ֔ים <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nim, [were] encamped עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against גִּבְּת֖וֹן <S%H1405><s%> gib-be-Ton against Gibbethon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> lap-pe-lish-Tim. which [belonged] to the Philistines

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people הַחֹנִ֣ים <S%H2583><s%> ha-cho-Nim [that were] encamped לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, say קָשַׁ֣ר <S%H7194><s%> ka-Shar hath conspired זִמְרִ֔י <S%H2174><s%> zim-Ri, Zimri וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam also הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah and hath also slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; the king וַיַּמְלִ֣כוּ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yam-Li-chu king כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el wherefore all Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָמְרִ֨י <S%H6018><s%> 'a-me-Ri made Omri שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- the captain צָבָ֧א <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va of the host עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El over Israel בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. in the camp

וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Leh went up עָמְרִ֛י <S%H6018><s%> 'a-me-Ri And Omri וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and all Israel עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo from מִֽגִּבְּת֑וֹן <S%H1405><s%> mig-gib-be-Ton; from Gibbethon וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <S%H6696><s%> vai-ya-Tzu-ru with him and they besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and תִּרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> tir-Tzah. Tirzah
